scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn compile && yarn copy-assets && yarn update-manifest
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r css assets js index.html dist/
scripts.update-manifest: node -e "const manifest = require('./manifest.json'); manifest.background.service_worker = './background.js'; manifest.content_scripts[0].js = ['./content.js']; require('fs').writeFileSync('./dist/manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2));"
